settings.content: Product labels are small colored words which appear over product images, either on the product card or the product page (or both).
A maximum of two labels will be shown on product cards.

settings.label: Visibility on product cards
settings.info: Labels will show below the image for List view cards on mobile.

settings.label: Show "Best seller" label
settings.info: On products for which the compare-at price is set

settings.label: Show "New" label for products in the following collections
Show "New" label for products with the following tag
Show "New" label for products created within this many days

settings.content: A product is a preorder if its template name contains the word 'preorder'. [Read more](https://cleancanvas.co.uk/support/enterprise/settings/product-labels)

For custom labels, add a product metafield with the namespace and key 'theme.label', with the 'Single line text' type. [Read more](https://cleancanvas.co.uk/support/enterprise/settings/product-labels)
